How to start

Aparicio Johan

Source: vignettes/my-vignette.Rmd
my-vignette.Rmd

Loading libraries

library(tidyverse)
library(GS)
library(sommer)

Genotypic information

data(DT_cpdata)

geno <- GT_cpdata
geno[1:5,1:3]
#      scaffold_50439_2381 scaffold_39344_153 uneak_3436043
# P003                   0                  0             0
# P004                   0                  0             0
# P005                   0                 -1             0
# P006                  -1                 -1            -1
# P007                   0                  0             0

Vector with genotype names

samp <- rownames(GT_cpdata)
samp[1:5]
# [1] "P003" "P004" "P005" "P006" "P007"

Phenotypic information

phen <- DT_cpdata
head(phen,3)
#        id Row Col Year      color  Yield FruitAver Firmness Rowf Colf
# P003 P003   3   1 2014 0.10075269 154.67     41.93  588.917    3    1
# P004 P004   4   1 2014 0.13891940 186.77     58.79  640.031    4    1
# P005 P005   5   1 2014 0.08681502  80.21     48.16  671.523    5    1

Cross validation

tmp <- crossGP(geno,samp,phen,prior = "sommer", niter=5,testporc = 0.3,traits = names(phen)[5:6])
# []==============================================================[]
# []==================== Genomic Prediction  =====================[]
# []============= ASReml - BGLR - sommer package  ================[]
# []======= Last update: 2020-03-18  Johan Aparicio ==============[]
# []==============================================================[]
# color  == 362
# Yield  == 362
# 
# prior trait   randomPop   hrk corr    finishedAt
# sommer    color   Pop_1   0.6403  0.6078  2020-03-20 08:34:13
# sommer    color   Pop_2   0.6043  0.5745  2020-03-20 08:34:14
# sommer    color   Pop_3   0.5452  0.6774  2020-03-20 08:34:14
# sommer    color   Pop_4   0.6246  0.6349  2020-03-20 08:34:14
# sommer    color   Pop_5   0.6677  0.4992  2020-03-20 08:34:14
# sommer    Yield   Pop_1   0.0893  0.2351  2020-03-20 08:34:15
# sommer    Yield   Pop_2   0.1619  0.1098  2020-03-20 08:34:15
# sommer    Yield   Pop_3   0.084   0.2869  2020-03-20 08:34:15
# sommer    Yield   Pop_4   0.1627  0.128   2020-03-20 08:34:16
# sommer    Yield   Pop_5   0.1341  0.0851  2020-03-20 08:34:16
# 
# []============================ End =============================[]

ggplot(tmp$data, aes(x=trait,y=corr))+geom_boxplot()
